class.name: OScriptNodeEvent
class.brief_description: A specialized function entry point for Godot event callbacks such as [method _ready].
class.description: An [OScriptNodeEvent] represents the entrypoint for a Godot event callback. These nodes can only exist within an [param EventGraph], and consist of a single output control flow pin and zero or more output data pins, each which represent arguments to the event function. A specific [OScriptNodeEvent] for a given event callback can only exist within an orchestration once. For example, you cannot define two [OScriptNodeEvent] nodes for [method _ready].
